title: Fried egg ‘bourguignon’ with duck confit and cracklings and grilled Portobello mushrooms
description: This dish can be served as a scrummy dinner party starter, or as a light meal when you want to impress.
ingredients: 4 Portobello mushrooms (about 8cm/3¼in in diameter), stems trimmed and reserved, skin peeled and reserved
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
110g/4oz small red onions, such as red pearl onions, peeled and halved
salt and freshly ground black pepper
150g/5oz mixed wild mushrooms (such as chestnut, shiitake and girolles), trimmed and rinsed
trimmings and skin from Portobello mushrooms (see above)
1 ready-made confit duck leg, meat picked from bone and roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
